metadata.title: CVE-2015-6821 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The ff_mpv_common_init function in libavcodec/mpegvideo.c in FFmpeg before2.7.2 does not properly maintain the encoding context, which allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (invalid pointer access) or possiblyhave unspecified other impact via crafted MPEG data.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
